I've been unable to fix this problem directly so I'm now using a workaround. I believe these two functions are equivalent as long as logits is of rank 3. Thankfully, the alt function does not appear to be any slower.

def base_sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(logits, labels):
    return tf.nn.sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(labels=labels, logits=logits)


def alt_sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(logits, labels):
    log_softmax = tf.nn.log_softmax(logits)
    logits_shape = tf.shape(logits)
    y, x = tf.meshgrid(tf.range(logits_shape[1]), tf.range(logits_shape[0]))
    indexes = tf.stack([x, y, labels], axis=-1)
    return -tf.gather_nd(log_softmax, tf.cast(indexes, tf.int64))
